arts.ttl: Hungary vs Portugal live broadcast – Time and channel to watch the match
arts.sum: Portugal takes on Hungary this Tuesday at 8:45 PM (French time) in a match that will be broadcast on L’Equipe Live Foot. The game will take place at the Ferenc Puskás Stadium as part of the 2026 World Cup qualifying round. Four Paris Saint-Germain players are involved in this match, all representing Portugal: Nuno Mendes […]
